imdb.plot outline: 'My Big Amazing Renovation' gives audiences ideas for totally changing their homes, whether it's a room or the back splash in the kitchen. Every episode features a home that viewers can follow from design to construction to completion. Plus, the pros will show the audience their secrets for saving time, treasure, and talent while remodeling a home.
imdb.title: My Big Amazing Renovation
plot: '_My Big Amazing Renovation_ (qv)' gives audiences ideas for totally changing their homes, whether it's a room or the back splash in the kitchen. Every episode features a home that viewers can follow from design to construction to completion. Plus, the pros will show the audience their secrets for saving time, treasure, and talent while remodeling a home.::Anonymous

_My Big Amazing Renovation_ (qv) is HGTV's newest show, giving you ideas for totally changing your home whether it's a room or the back splash in your kitchen. Every episode features a home that you can follow from design to construction to completion. And the designs are incredible, from a wine cave to wildly creative counter tops to a complete overhaul and expansion. Plus, the pros on the show will give you insight on the latest in materials and tools and share their secrets for saving time and money.::Anonymous
